name: Flykeeper
description:
【Notice】

·  This is a very short Helltaker fan game.
   The main characters are Beelzebub and Helltaker (you).

·  It contains a lot of personal imagination of Beelzebub's character and experience.
 
·  It contains a little bit of horror (in bad ends) and suggestive content.

【Introduction】

·  The main content is Helltaker's (Your) life in the Abyss with Beelzebub.
   There are three action choices every day. Different actions lead to different events.
   Many events contain CG, which can be viewed in the [GALLERY].
   Your choices and three values in the game determine the ending.

·  Ending:  Bad End*4    Normal End*2    True End*3
